channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- WebSphere MQ
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- WebSphere MQ

item.title: CVE-2018-1388|2024-08-05T03:59:38.974Z -- ibm -- websphere%20mq
item.description: GSKit V7 may disclose side channel information via discrepancies between valid and invalid PKCS#1 padding. IBM X-Force ID: 138212.

item.title: CVE-2018-1503|2024-08-05T03:59:39.062Z -- ibm -- websphere%20mq
item.description: IBM WebSphere MQ 7.5, 8.0, and 9.0 could allow a remotely authenticated attacker to to send invalid or malformed headers that could cause messages to no longer be transmitted via the affected channel. IBM X-Force ID: 141339.

item.title: CVE-2018-1374|2024-08-05T03:59:38.605Z -- ibm -- websphere%20mq
item.description: An IBM WebSphere MQ (Maintenance levels 7.1.0.0 - 7.1.0.9, 7.5.0.0 - 7.5.0.8, 8.0.0.0 - 8.0.0.8, 9.0.0.0 - 9.0.0.2, and 9.0.0 - 9.0.4) client connecting to a Queue Manager could cause a SIGSEGV in the Channel process amqrmppa. IBM X-Force ID: 137775.

item.title: CVE-2018-1551|2024-08-05T04:07:43.764Z -- ibm -- websphere%20mq
item.description: IBM WebSphere MQ 8.0.0.2 through 8.0.0.8 and 9.0.0.0 through 9.0.0.3 could allow users to have more authority than they should have if an MQ administrator creates an invalid user group name. IBM X-Force ID: 142888.

item.title: CVE-2017-1795|2024-08-05T13:39:32.307Z -- ibm -- websphere%20mq
item.description: IBM WebSphere MQ 7.5, 8.0, and 9.0 through 9.0.4 could allow a local user to obtain highly sensitive information via trace logs in IBM WebSphere MQ Managed File Transfer. IBM X-Force ID: 137042.

item.title: CVE-2017-1118|2024-08-05T13:25:17.224Z -- ibm -- websphere%20mq
item.description: IBM WebSphere MQ Internet Pass-Thru 2.0 and 2.1 could allow n attacker to cause the MQIPT to stop responding due to an incorrectly configured security policy. IBM X-Force ID: 121156.
